text:
Whether Meghan Markle’s father shows at St. George’s Chapel at Windsor Castle on Saturday was the subject of fevered speculation among royal obsessives on Tuesday.

Advertisement

Thomas Markle told the celebrity news site TMZ on Tuesday that he wanted to walk his daughter down the aisle, but was not sure if he could.

“Of course I’d walk her down the aisle. This is a historic moment. I’d like to be a part of history,” he told the website.

According to TMZ, Thomas Markle regretted working with a photographer and posing for pictures, which included pictures of the retiree getting measured for his wedding suit. Photo: The Sun

But he wasn’t sure if he would be able to travel to Britain.

Advertisement

He said he was back in the hospital after suffering chest pains and wasn’t sure if the doctors would release him in time.
title: Meghan Markle’s father now says he will walk his daughter down the aisle – if he can make it to the UK

meta_data.description: Thomas Markle says, ‘I’d like to be a part of history’, but is not sure if he will be able to travel to Britain and attend the royal wedding because of his health
